line: well that is because you always sleep to noon silly

going to this culinary fair in new jersey

and i just need to yknow talk to rachel about it

and not the part that makes me do this

well remember when they got in that big fight and broke up and we were all stuck in her with no food or anything
well when ross said rachel at the wedding i figured it was gonna happen again so i hid this in here
you do not know how long we are gonna be in here
we may have to repopulate the earth
and condoms are the way to do that
anyway it it kinda it all boils down to this the last time i talked to emily
oh my god le poo our dog
oh god it says he was hit by an ice cream truck and dragged for nine teen blocks
i know it is le poo right now but it will get better
oh you should live with joey roll os everywhere
there is a high speed car chase on

no they gave us glasses with lipstick on them
i mean if they did not change the glasses who knows what else they did not change

okay but let us do it now though because chopper 5 just lost it is feed
hey so uh yknow how there is something i wanted to talk to you about
well yknow how trying to work things out with emily
well there is this one thing okay here goes
i made a promise that oh hey
this this happened when my grandfather died
oh okay so sorry what what were you what did you want to tell me
okay i uh i cannot see you anymore
i think you will find this room more to your liking
they say he is only got half a tank left
we still got a lot of high speed chasing to do
this is a garden view room and we paid for an ocean view room
our last ocean view room was unacceptable to you
excuse me umm can i talk to you over here for just a second
look these clowns are trying to take us for a ride and not gonna let em
and we are not a couple of suckers
but look all these rooms are fine okay
can you just pick one so i can watch have a perfect magical weekend together with you
can we turn the tv off
do we really want to spend the entire weekend like this
oh sorry am i getting in the way of all the room switching fun
hey do not blame me for wigging tonight
the nice bell man who had to drag out luggage to 10 different rooms
i do not know how about the idiot who thought he could drive from albany to canada on a half a tank of gas
do not speak ill of the dead
we are supposed to uh be spending a romantic weekend together it it what is the matter with you
i just want to watch a little television
rachel i i been wanting to tell you something for a while now and i really i just have to get it out
okay yknow how you told me i should do whatever it takes to fix my marriage
yeah i told you to give emily whatever she wants
and while that was good advice you should know that what what she wants
is for me not to see you anymore
what are you going to tell her
ohh you already agreed to this have not you
it is awful i know i mean i feel terrible but i have to do this if i want my marriage to work
and i do i have to make this marriage work
but the good thing is we can still see each other until she gets here
i think that is the best news heard since le poo died
you have no idea what a nightmare this has been
okay well let me make this a just a little bit easier for you
yeah well that is how mad i am
i fought with my colleagues yknow the entire time
oh so your weekend was a total bust
uh no i got to see donald trump waiting for an elevator
umm chandler can i talk to you outside for a second
hey how was your chef thing
i guess some people just do not appreciate really good food
well maybe it was the kind of food that tasted good at first but then made everybody vomit and have diarrhea
okay like to know how much the room was because like to pay my half
yeah just think of it as 25 per room
what are you guys woofing about
chandler stole a twenty from my purse
now that i think about it i constantly find myself without twenties and you always have lots
you should have seen the look on her face
i do not want rachel to hate me
i do not know what to do
you are not gonna like it
man if anyone asked me to give up any of you i could not do it
look i know you guys heard about the whole thing with me and ross but yknow been obsessing about it all day and just love not to talk about it
i i i do not know if this falls under this category but uh ross is right back there
he does look like him though
okay ross is in the bathroom
do you even know who kip is
kip my old roommate yknow we all used to hang out together
oh that poor b st rd
yeah you told me the story
he and monica dated when they broke up they could not even be in the same room together and you all promised that you would stay his friend and what happened
you are not gonna be phased out

he is your old college roommate
ugh it was just a matter of time before someone had to leave the group

that uh hotel you stayed at called
said someone left an eyelash curler in your room
because i figured you had hooked up with some girl and she had left it there
yes that would have made more sense
yknow i i do not even feel like i know you anymore man
all right look just gonna ask you this one time
and whatever you say believe ya
were you or were you not on a gay cruise
sorry about the whole lifting out thing
come on you and me we will we will start a new group we are the best ones

is not this against the rules

the one who is making things change so i should be the one to yknow step back
they are plenty of people who just see their sisters at thanksgiving and just see their college roommates at reunions and just see joey at burger king
i still do not get to see you
well what what would you do
rach if you were me what what would you do
well for starters i would have said the right name at my wedding
i cannot believe this is happening
sorry to interrupt but umm phoebe wanted me to talk to you about a trip or something
i just came over to drop off nothing
so that weekend kinda sucked huh
so i guess this is over
well yknow you and me it had to end sometime
because of the weekend we had a fight
if you give up every time you had have a fight with someone you had never be with anyone longer than ohhh
you deal with it and move on
it is nothing to freak out about
ohh welcome to an adult relationship
oh hey monica i heard you saw donald trump at your convention
yeah i saw him waiting for an elevator
hey rach can i borrow your eyelash curler i think i lost mine
joey can i talk to you for a second
yes but you cannot tell anyone
the reason we did not tell anyone was because we did not want to make a big deal out of it
but it is a big deal
we just do not want to deal with telling everyone okay
just promise you will not tell
i mean it is great but
aww i do not want to see that

they are trying to take joey

and if you win you must slap your opponent on the phoebe and say hi phoebe

count in our heads as as good madlibs
if if we follow the rules it is still fun and it means something
